com.planetbiru.pushserver.database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.planetbiru.pushserver.database.Database

  • public final class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to access the databases

    Kamshory, MT

      • connect

        public boolean connect(java.lang.String databaseType,
                       java.lang.String databaseHostName,
                       int databasePortNumber,
                       java.lang.String databaseUserName,
                       java.lang.String databaseUserPassword,
                       java.lang.String databaseName)
                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                       java.sql.SQLException,
                       DatabaseTypeException
        Connect to the database threads
        Parameters:
        databaseType - Database type supported. i.e postgresql, mysql, mariadb
        databaseHostName - Database host name
        databasePortNumber - Database threads port
        databaseUserName - User name to connect to the database
        databaseUserPassword - User password to connect to the database
        databaseName - Database name
        Returns:
        true if success and false if failed.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if any SQL errors
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if class not found
        DatabaseTypeException - if database type not supported

      • connect

        Returns:
        true if success and false is failed.
        Throws:

        java.sql.SQLException - if any SQL errors
        DatabaseTypeException - if database type not supported

      • setConfigurationStringEncrypted

        public boolean setConfigurationStringEncrypted(java.lang.String configuration)
                                        throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                               java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                               javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                                               javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                               java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                               javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                                               java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                               java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                               java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Load configuration from encrypted string
        Parameters:
        configuration - Base64 encoded string
        Returns:
        true if success and false if failed
        Throws:
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - if padding is invalid
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if algorithm is not found
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if key is invalid
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if data is null
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if encoding is not supported
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - if padding is invalid
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException - if block size is invalid
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getEncryptedConfiguration

        public java.lang.String getEncryptedConfiguration()
                                           throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                                  javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                                  javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                                                  java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                                  java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                  javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException
        Get encrypted database configuration
        Returns:
        String contains base64 encoded cipher text
        Throws:
        JSONException - if any JSON errors
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - if padding is invalid
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException - if block size is invalid
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if encoding is not supported
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if data is null
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - if padding is invalid
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if algorithm is not found
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if key is invalid

      • decryptConfigurationJSON

        public JSONObject decryptConfigurationJSON(java.lang.String configuration)
                                    throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                           java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                           javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                                           javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                           javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                                           java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Decrypt database configuration
        Parameters:
        configuration - Database configuration
        Returns:
        configuration Cipher text contains database configuration
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if encryption key is invalid
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if algorithm is not found
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - if padding not found
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException - if block size is not present
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - if padding is invalid
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if encoding is not supported

      • decryptConfigurationNative

        public DatabaseConfiguration decryptConfigurationNative(java.lang.String configuration)
                                                 throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                                        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                                                        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                                        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                                                        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Decrypt configuration
        Parameters:
        configuration - Cipher text contains database configuration
        Returns:
        String contains database configurations
        Throws:
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - if padding is invalid
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if algorithm is not found
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if key is invalid
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if encoding is not supported
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - if padding is invalid
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException - if block size is invalid
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • encryptConfiguration

        public java.lang.String encryptConfiguration(java.lang.String databaseType,
                                             java.lang.String databaseHostName,
                                             int databasePortNumber,
                                             java.lang.String databaseUserName,
                                             java.lang.String databaseUserPassword,
                                             java.lang.String databaseName)
                                      throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                             java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                             javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                                             java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                             java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                             javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                             javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        Encrypt database configuration
        Parameters:
        databaseType - Database type
        databaseHostName - Host name
        databasePortNumber - Port number
        databaseUserName - Username
        databaseUserPassword - Password
        databaseName - Database name
        Returns:
        String contains encrypted database configuration
        Throws:
        JSONException - if any JSON errors
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - if padding is invalid
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if algorithm is not found
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if key is invalid
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException - if padding is invalid
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException - if block size is invalid
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - id encoding is not supported
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
